pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Jiao1 tong1 Yun4 shu1 Xie2 hui4

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
